original_command: \powershell.exe \pwsh.exe \wmic.exe \vssadmin.exe \diskshadow.exe PowerShell.EXE pwsh.dll wmic.exe VSSADMIN.EXE diskshadow.exe shadow delete \wbadmin.exe WBADMIN.EXE delete catalog quiet \vssadmin.exe VSSADMIN.EXE resize shadowstorage unbounded /MaxSize=
